title: BostonMarriage (@Boston_Married) | Twitter
body: The latest Tweets from BostonMarriage (@Boston_Married). Thinking things through. Personally and politically no fixed address. Applied feminism. Big Dyke Energy. Australia
readable_content:
**boston married** (2023-10-04):
@Boston_Married
We are just keeping this cruelty hidden, by proudly saying we don't allow euthanasia for people in these circumstances, and offering all these social housing campaigns to lie to the electorate that enough is being done. 
To her credit, the lady acknowledged this
